landingPage.title: Welcome to DiscoSpot!
landingPage.text: Connect your Discogs & Spotify accounts and create custom playlists based on your Record or CD collection!

getStarted.title: Getting Started
getStarted.explanation: First, we need to connect to Discogs to grant DiscoSpot access to your account. Next, we'll need to connect to your Spotify account and grant access there as well.

spotifyConnect.title: Connect to your Spotify account
spotifyConnect.explanation: Next, we need to connect to Spotify to grant DiscoSpot access to your account.

playlistIndex.title: My Playlists
playlistIndex.introText: This is a list of all your playlist you've created with DiscoSpot!
playlistIndex.maxPlaylistsText: You have reached your maximum amount of playlists, if you wish to add more, please upgrade your account

playlistShow.title: Playlist Details
playlistShow.confirmRemoveDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist? Your playlist will still be available in Spotify.

playlistCreate.title: Create new Playlist
playlistCreate.stepOneTitle: Name & type of your new playlist
playlistCreate.stepTwoFoldersTitle: Select the folder you want to convert into a playlist
playlistCreate.stepTwoListsTitle: Select the list you want to convert into a playlist

form.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
form.confirmRemoveDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
form.confirmMassRemoveDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete these students?

validation.email: This field must contain a correct email address
